Threat: Attackers may exploit improperly implemented input validation mechanisms on the Frontend, and thereby gain unauthorized access to the Web Server.
Mitigation: Implement strict input validation on all user-supplied data to prevent injection attacks like SQL and XSS.

Threat: Attackers may exploit improperly implemented input validation mechanisms on the Frontend, and thereby gain unauthorized access to the Web Server.
Mitigation: Limit the amount of requests that the user can make at once.
